Name: One Bit
About the game: Onebit, This is the story of Onebit, a poor, cute character that is continious searching for a pixel someone has stolen from him. He simply can`t go on with his life knowing that he is missin a pixel. Your task will be to go tro a long and exciting adventure, on his search for the one that have stolen his pixel and retaliation. In this Action filled 2D classic platform game, You will for sure be entertained! Onebit is a retro platformer where your charather can shoot deadly laser from his eyes. there is many puzzeles and enemies in every corner. One bit has 8 chapters. In every chapter it is 2 levels. every chapter has it own theme. A free patch is coming soon where every chapter will get 2 more levels, and 1 bonus chapter. and last but not least a level editor. Thanks hope you wil enjoy the wacky world of Onebit.
